name.namePart: Pennsylvania Department of Transportation, Bureau of Planning and Research, Cartographic Information Division

mods.abstract: County boundaries within Pennsylvania as delineated for the PennDOT Type 10 general highway map.
Public information and support for transportation planning, design and development.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: This record was translated from FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata to MODS v.3 using an xsl transformation.
